name: IconButton
author: Leon Zhang
description: A button with an anchored icon in addition to a label

documentation.description: A button with an anchored icon in addition to a label, allowing users to specify button with icons with having to worry about the exact CSS behind the layout

attributes.src: Defines the image source to use as the button's icon. Only does something if the icon is a element (which is the default behavior)
attributes.icon-anchor: Defines the location of the icon relative to the label. Valid options are 'left', 'top', 'right', 'bottom'

getters.src: Returns the image source used as the button's icon. Only does something if the icon is a element (which is the default behavior)
getters.icon-anchor: Returns the location of the icon relative to the label. Valid options are 'left', 'top', 'right', 'bottom'
getters.icon: Returns the DOM element representing the button's icon
getters.label: Returns the DOM element representing the button's label
getters.text: Returns the text content of the button, as defined by the textGetter
getters.textGetter: Returns the function used to calculate how to read the button's text contents
getters.textSetter: Returns the function used to calculate how to change the button's text contents

setters.src: Sets the image source used as the button's icon. Only does something if the icon is a element (which is the default behavior)
setters.icon-anchor: Sets the location of the icon relative to the label. Valid options are 'left', 'top', 'right', 'bottom'
setters.icon: Replaces the DOM element representing the button's icon with the given DOM element
setters.label: Replaces the DOM element representing the button's label with the given DOM element
setters.text: Replaces the text content of the button, as defined by the textSetter
setters.textGetter: Replaces the function used to calculate how to read the button's text contents
setters.textSetter: Replaces the function used to calculate how to change the button's text contents
